name: Dispatched!
description:
Dispatched!  "The Hungry Hungry Hippos of late-stage capitalism."

From the same idiots who made 'Plane Food Simulator': https://sheepandram.itch.io/pfs2021

Platform = PC and Android App Store

Full Description:

In Dispatched! the aim of the game is to mail as many parcels as you can within the allocated time! Be careful you don't confuse the priority boxes, and make sure you bring an empty bottle.

PC Controls:

Enter = Begin Game

Q  = Dispatch Parcel (Employee Left)

P = Dispatch Parcel (Employee Right)

Android/Phone Controls:

Tap Screen = Begin Game

Tap Screen (Left hand side) = Dispatch Parcel (Employee Left)

Tap Screen (Right hand side) = Dispatch Parcel (Employee Right)
